channel.title: CVE Feed for Yi -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Yi -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-3947|2024-09-16T21:57:21.602Z -- yi -- yi%20technology
item.description: An exploitable information disclosure vulnerability exists in the phone-to-camera communications of Yi Home Camera 27US 1.8.7.0D. An attacker can sniff network traffic to exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-3928|2024-09-16T20:58:52.752Z -- yi -- yi%20technology
item.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the firmware update functionality of Yi Home Camera 27US 1.8.7.0D. A specially crafted set of UDP packets can cause a settings change, resulting in denial of service. An attacker can send a set of packets to trigger this vulnerability.
